## Team Average Scores

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
events <- gs_matches %>%
  group_by(event, event_std) %>%
  summarize(no = min(match_number)) %>%
  arrange(no) %>%
  mutate(event_id = row_number())

```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}


event_std<- res_long %>% 
  group_by(event_std, round, event_round) %>%  summarize(
    event_sd = sd(score, na.rm=TRUE), 
    event_mu = mean(score, na.rm=TRUE),
    has_zig_zag = sum(team=="Zig-Zag Racers"&!is.na(score), na.rm=TRUE)>0,
    has_gs = sum(team=="GS"&!is.na(score), na.rm=TRUE)>0,
    has_gt = sum(team=="GT"&!is.na(score), na.rm=TRUE)>0,
    team_type = ifelse(has_zig_zag&has_gs&has_gt, "all", 
                       ifelse(has_zig_zag, ifelse(has_gt, "zz1 and gt","zz1 only"), 
                       ifelse(has_gt, "gt and gs", "gs only")))
    ) %>%
  left_join(events, by="event_std") %>%
  arrange(event_id, round) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(event_round_id = row_number())


event_byteam<- res_long %>% 
  group_by(event_std, round, event_round, team) %>%  
  summarize(
    event_sd = sd(score, na.rm=TRUE), 
    event_mu = mean(score, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  left_join(events) %>%
  arrange(event_id, round) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  left_join(event_std %>% dplyr::select(event_std, round, event_round_id))%>%
  mutate(rd = round, 
         event_label = ifelse(rd==1, event_std, NA_character_))

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
event_byteam %>%
  mutate(event_std = factor(event_std, levels = events$event_std[order(events$event_id)])) %>%
ggplot(aes(round, event_mu, colour=team)) +
  facet_wrap(~event_std, scales="free_x")+
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(aes(colour=team)) +
  labs(y="Average Score") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels=NULL, breaks=c(1,2,3,4)) +
  theme_bw()
```
